title: Energy & Vitality
subtitle: Stop running on empty
description: Chronic fatigue and low energy are epidemic. This course addresses the real causes—not just caffeine and sleep—covering nervous system drain, emotional exhaustion, energy leaks, and how to build genuine vitality.

modules.title: Understanding Energy
modules.description: What drains you and what fills you

modules.title: Emotional Energy
modules.description: The hidden cost of unfelt feelings

modules.title: Plugging Energy Leaks
modules.description: Relationships, commitments, and habits that drain you

modules.title: Energy Management
modules.description: Working with your energy throughout the day

whatYouLearn: Understand the multiple sources of energy and drain
Build practices that create genuine vitality
Manage energy wisely throughout the day
requirements: Current experience of low energy or fatigue
Medical causes ruled out by doctor if fatigue is severe

questions.question: What are the main sources of energy drain beyond physical?
options: Nervous system dysregulation, emotional suppression, unhealthy relationships, and misalignment with values

questions.question: How does chronic stress drain energy?
options: Constant activation depletes the nervous system and requires enormous resources to maintain

questions.question: How do unfelt emotions drain energy?
options: Suppression requires constant effort and creates chronic tension

questions.question: What is an 'energy leak'?
options: Anything that consistently drains you without proportional return—relationships, commitments, habits

questions.question: What creates genuine vitality?
options: Aligned living, nervous system regulation, expressed emotions, and real rest

questions.question: How should energy be managed throughout the day?
options: Work with natural rhythms, take breaks, match tasks to energy levels
